Params: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory154.png

The decks of the Nighter—a floating stronghold tasked with perimeter and maritime defense—is littered with the dead and dying, consequences of a costly battle against the Ascendant earlier in the day.
Apart from the Nighter crew, there are also members of the Forsaken and the ACA, who have stayed to bolster the defense.
Striding past them, Pulao can manage nothing more than nods of appreciation—she had more pressing matters to attend to.
Pulao
Be careful! Lash the corners tight. Did they not teach you how to tie knots?
Pulao is directing the Nighter crew to move the vast amounts of cargo still on board the ship.
Pulao
There is only so much that we can carry. All this precious cargo, supplies that have kept the Voyage afloat for all this time. A tragedy, to be honest......
Having lived on board for such a long time, Pulao has conflicted feelings about the Nighter.
Pulao
They've all scurried ashore and left this mess for me to clean up. The Nighter is so quiet—eh? Perhaps not so quiet after all.
Next to a haphazard collection of cargo, two bands of people are locked into a standoff. Judging by their outfits, neither belong to the crew.
Forsaken Soldier
Enough, Akdilek scum! We've had enough of your nonsense!
Sophia
It is not nonsensical for the cargo to go to the highest bidder.
Forsaken Soldier
What you call "highest bidder", I call "cutting in line"! The Nighter promised us this cargo. We had a deal!
Jamilah
They would sell one of their own if the price was right. An oral contract means nothing to them.
Forsaken Soldier
Hey! What are you all jabbering about!
Forsaken Soldier
Watanabe-San ordered us to procure supplies here. We will not leave empty-handed!
As the tension reaches a boiling point between the two factions, hordes of Corrupted suddenly descend on the Nighter, plunging the deck into chaos.
Corrupted
Sophia
Boss, it's the Corrupted. They came out of nowhere.
Jamilah
Wave after wave of cretins to deal with today. So exhausting, right, Sophia?
At Jamilah's command, Sophia draws her Dual Guns, laying down suppressive fire and covering Jamilah's retreat.
Ignoring Jamilah's jibes, the Forsaken draw their own weapons and face off against the Corrupted.
Watanabe
Akdileks...... stay out of this. This is a concern for the Forsaken alone.
Watanabe
(That Ascendant—Lamia—wasn't lying after all. She brought her Corrupted on board the ship.)
Prime
—AAAAGGHHH!
Watanabe
Even the renowned Kowloong Constructs are being infected...... what is that mermaid up to?
Forsaken Soldier
Watanabe-San, you're back? Sorry, we haven't secured the cargo yet, thanks to those meddling Akdileks!
Jamilah
To the gentleman of the Forsaken late to our convocation, this matter is of our concern as well. The price for interrupting an Akdilek transaction is steep.
Pulao

Ladies and gentlemen of both the Akdilek and the Forsaken, my name is Pulao. I am, temporarily, the administrator of this vessel and its cargo. Allow me to present my resolution for the ownership of this shipment.
Pulao
Whoever eliminates the most Corrupted...... shall receive "all of the cargo"!
Sophia
If that's the case, Sophia cannot lose.
Forsaken Soldier
Watanabe-San will not lose either, little girl!
